name: Dinnertime!
description:
WASD to move. 1, 2, 3, 4 or MOUSE WHEEL to select ITEMS. SPACE to use.

Feed the baby while protecting your plants from hungry rats.

Use your watering can to water your plants.

  

Use the shovel to dig up plants, and the scythe to harvest them.

  

Use the red plant to shoot rats. You'll have to let it grow before it works, and it often needs more water to function

  

Use the green plant to feed the baby. You'll have to let it grow before it works

Don't let the baby die!
